channel.title: [ 508 ] Parenthium direct download
channel.description:
I wanted more people to use this base, because I am told by people that actually have tried it, that they really like the base. I think that if people started to develop on this base rsps could be a lot faster / stable in the 500+ section. I am posting this thread for people that don't have Tortise SVN, or just can't figure out how to use it. I haven't been updating this publicly, but more as private development. If I see a lot of users using this base and liking it, I will probably start to release things. The walking is still bugged in this release, but I will tell you it's because of the way it calculates a path. If you fix the walking, post it and I will add it to this thread, but the walking would work fine if you did a server that doesn't have client sided pathfinding. The code in this download can be found on the svn here:
[url=http://code.google.com/p/parenthium/source/browse/#svn/trunk/parenthium-netty]parenthium - Project Hosting on Google Code[/url]
Information on this server can be found on the old project thread, here: It's all on r--s soooooooo.. you gotta look it up on there if you want any information. let me just say it's one of the better frameworks for 500+.
Green - Finished, Yellow - Started, Red - Not Started
[ul][li][b]Networking[/b][/li] [list] [li][color=yellow][b]Core[/b][/li] [li][color=green][b]Handshake Decoder[/b][/li] [li][color=green][b]Update server decoder(sends crc keys)[/b][/li] [li][color=green][b]Login[/b][/li] [li][color=green][b]Packet decoding[/b][/li][/list] [li][b]Player Updating[/b][/li] [list] [li][color=green][b]Single player[/b][/li] [li][color=green][b]Muliplayer[/b][/li] [li][color=yellow][b]All masks[/b][/li] [/list] [li][b]GNP1 Packet[/b][/li] [list] [li][b][color=green]Spawning[/li] [li][b][color=yellow]Masks[/li] [/list] [li][b]Content[/b][/li] [list] [li][b][color=red]Skills[/b][/li] [li][b][color=red]Combat[/b][/li] [/list] [li][b]Packet handlers[/b][/li] [list] [li][b][color=red]ItemOption[/li] [li][b][color=red]Commands[/li] [li][b][color=red]Equip[/li] [li][b][color=yellow]Walking[/li] [li][b][color=green]Quiet[/li] [li][b][color=red]NPCOption[/li] [li][b][color=red]PlayerOption[/li] [/list][/ul]
Download: http://www.mediafire.com/?9o4clb7cj7340yu
Enjoy :)
P.S. I am `Discardedx2 on r--s forums I am currently working on a new framework which uses quite a bit of generics.

Pictures for lazy noobs to look and see if it’s good.

And C&P the information; don’t be lazy like noobs without pictures.
[/quote]
Dont complain over picture’s broski.[/quote]
I wasn’t being ‘complaining,’ I clearly stated

Uncalled:

Pictures for lazy noobs to look and see if it’s good.

I care not for pictures, I want information about it.
